Template.name: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor
Template.xmlTemplate: <RichTextEditor xmlns="sap.ui.richtexteditor" id="${id}" busy="false" busyIndicatorDelay="1000" visible="true" fieldGroupIds="" value="" textDirection="Inherit" width="" height="" editorType="TinyMCE" editorLocation="js/tiny_mce/tiny_mce_src.js" editable="true" showGroupFontStyle="true" showGroupTextAlign="true" showGroupStructure="true" showGroupFont="false" showGroupClipboard="true" showGroupInsert="false" showGroupLink="false" showGroupUndo="false" wrapping="true" required="false" sanitizeValue="true" plugins="" useLegacyTheme="true" buttonGroups="" customToolbar="false" validateFieldGroup="" change="" ready="" readyRecurring="" beforeEditorInit=""> <tooltip></tooltip> <!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase --> <dependents></dependents> <!-- sap.ui.core.Element, since 1.19 --> <customButtons></customButtons> <!-- sap.ui.core.Control, since 1.48 --> </RichTextEditor>
